page.title: 15 BRAINTREE AUTO CLUB
page.content: Braintree Auto Club was formed 14 years ago. It has about 300 members although not all of them race. There are about 14 race meetings a year,with 20 races. The track is 1/4 mile long. Different formula cars have different races. There are 850s,1300s,bangers and hot rods. All of the cars except the hot rods are allowed to hit other cars deliberately. All of the cars have a roll bar and the drivers wear a special safety harness. There are very few serious accidents. To start the race the marshalls wave a green flag. The commentater talks to the audience and it is very exciting. At the end of the race the winner does a lap of honour. The last race is always a novelty race - sometimes two cars are joined together, or maybe they race in a figure of 8!
